name: oncoanalyser-comprehensive
title: Comprehensive Cancer Multi-Omics (WGS + RNA)
description: Integrated DNA+RNA cancer analysis. Combines WGS somatic variants with RNA-seq gene fusions, expression, and allele-specific expression for complete molecular profiling. Samplesheet format: `sample_id,sample_type,sequence_type,filetype,filepath`
content:
Multi-Omics Cancer Genomics

Integrates WGS + RNA-seq for the most comprehensive cancer molecular profiling. Combines somatic variants, gene fusions, expression, and allele-specific expression in one analysis.

Why DNA + RNA?

  • Gene Fusions: RNA confirms DNA SV-predicted fusions
  • Expression Context: Which mutations are transcribed?
  • Allele-Specific Expression: Loss of heterozygosity validation
  • Splice Variants: Oncogenic isoforms
  • Viral Transcripts: Active viral gene expression
  • Immune Signatures: Tumor microenvironment profiling

Integrated Analysis

DNA Layer (WGS):

  • SNVs, indels (SAGE)
  • Structural variants (GRIDSS)
  • Copy number alterations (PURPLE)
  • Viral integrations (VIRUSBREAKEND)
  • Microsatellite instability

RNA Layer (RNA-seq):

  • Gene fusions (Arriba)
  • Gene expression (RSEM)
  • Splice variants
  • Allele-specific expression
  • Immune cell deconvolution

Integration:

  • Fusion validation (DNA SV + RNA expression)
  • Expressed vs silent mutations
  • LOH validation (ASE)
  • Neoantigen prediction from expressed variants

Clinical Advantages

  • Fusion Discovery: High confidence (DNA + RNA evidence)
  • Actionable Targets: Know which mutations are expressed
  • Neoantigen Load: Immunotherapy response prediction
  • Drug Target Validation: Expression + variant context
  • Resistance Mechanisms: Compensatory pathway activation
  • Patient Stratification: Multi-dimensional molecular subtypes

Use Cases

  • Fusion-Driven Cancers: Sarcomas, pediatric cancers, NSCLC
  • Immunotherapy Selection: TMB + immune signatures
  • Targeted Therapy: Validate targets are expressed
  • Clinical Trials: Comprehensive molecular eligibility
  • Precision Medicine: Most complete molecular profile
  • Research: Systems biology of cancer

Key Fusions Detected

  • ALK: EML4-ALK (NSCLC)
  • ROS1: CD74-ROS1 (NSCLC)
  • NTRK: ETV6-NTRK3 (various)
  • RET: CCDC6-RET (thyroid, lung)
  • FGFR: FGFR3-TACC3 (bladder)
  • BRAF: KIAA1549-BRAF (glioma)

Input Requirements

CSV samplesheet with tumor-normal DNA (WGS BAMs) + tumor RNA (RNA-seq BAM/FASTQ):

  • Tumor DNA BAM
  • Normal DNA BAM
  • Tumor RNA BAM/FASTQ

Key Outputs

  • All DNA Outputs: SNVs, SVs, CNVs, drivers
  • Gene Fusions: High-confidence validated fusions
  • Gene Expression: TPM/FPKM for all genes
  • Expressed Variants: Which somatic mutations are transcribed
  • Allele-Specific Expression: LOH validation
  • Immune Profiling: Tumor microenvironment
  • Integrated Report: Combined DNA+RNA findings

Perfect for: Fusion cancers • Immunotherapy • Precision oncology • Clinical trials • Comprehensive profiling
